articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Taking Stock: Sensex falls 550 pts from day's high on profit booking, Nifty closes flat at 23,265 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Biggest losers on the Nifty included Kotak Mahindra Bank, Divi's Labs, and Asian Paints while biggest gainers were ONGC, L&T, and Adani Ports among others.
articles.content: The Nifty and Sensex ended traded mostly flat-to-positive on June 11, with NSE Nifty 50 reaching within touching distance of its all-time high that it hit in the previous session. However, the benchm… [+2343 chars]
